name: AVCaptureDepthDataOutput
desc: A capture output that records scene depth information on compatible camera devices.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a depth data output object.

items.name: var alwaysDiscardsLateDepthData: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the capture output should discard any depth data that is not processed before the next depth data is captured.

items.name: var isFilteringEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the depth data output should filter depth data to smooth out noise and fill invalid values.

items.name: func setDelegate(AVCaptureDepthDataOutputDelegate?, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Designates a delegate object to receive depth data and a dispatch queue for delivering that data.

items.name: var delegate: AVCaptureDepthDataOutputDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate object that receives depth data.

items.name: var delegateCallbackQueue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: A dispatch queue for delivering depth data.

items.name: protocol AVCaptureDepthDataOutputDelegate
items.desc: Methods for receiving depth data produced by a depth capture output.
